title: Main iwan (Qibla) of al-Ghuri Mosque
collector: Creswell, K. A. C. (Keppel Archibald Cameron), 1879-1974
description: Photographer's description:  No. 2064. Mosquée El-Ghouri.  Intérieur (vue du Kibléh & Membar). Translation of photographer's description: No. 2064. Mosque of al-Ghuri. Interior. (view of the Kibléh & Membar). Collector's note: A.H. 909 (1503)
date-created: ca. late 19th century or early 20th century
collection: K.A.C. Creswell Photographs of Islamic Architecture
